text:
Deskbookers [https://www.deskbookers.com] | Amsterdam | Full Time | Onsite | Visa

Deskbookers is a marketplace for workspaces and meeting rooms. Be part of a fast-growing startup in Europe. We have a fun, hardworking team that is focused on success. Lunch, fresh fruits, and coffee available daily, as well as Friday drinks and regular team events.

Our product team is hiring:

* Frontend Developer

* UI/Product Designer

Our stack comprises PHP, Node.js, PostgreSQL, React.JS (ES2015+) and is currently being developed into a microservices architecture, with modern tooling.

Please get in touch via y.talwar@deskbookers.com. Cheers!
